name: Beyond the Field
description:
Hello,

Beyond the Field is a top down shooter with inspiration from the classic "Asteroids" besides trying to destroy asteroids, there is also a scarab like race called «Nur'Zuma» that you have to fight and other space ships. The game also has the possibility of upgrading the ship or even adding «Drives», which are abilities to improve your experience.

I just started learning Unity and game development, so I made this small project to learn several aspects of the engine and get used to it, besides learning several components of game development. The game is unfinished, there being other ships to add and even a story mode, but for now we have no plans on proceeding with the development (However if it is requested, I may do so).

Design and Code: Aholo

Art: Makuayas

Music: Adry Ismayle
